about_the_game:
◆Story


Four or five o'clock in a bar.
A man puts his hand on my shoulder and digs into my pocket, while his other hand picks up the broken gold from the table and puts it in his own pocket.
"Come with me, it's quite a lot of money after all ...... huh... I can get you something extra."
He opened the door in front of him, and at the door ...... was a cat demon girl.



"In this world, although the demon is rare, but the matter of buying and selling them is already strange, I'm not easy to get one, although the bloodline is not very pure ...... but this appearance as you can see, the top quality goods!"
The man lowered his voice and leaned close to my ear...
"I'm sure your dead friend would have accepted it..."
I tugged at the man's collar and pushed him aside, wondering what he meant by that, while the cat-demon girl on the floor gave me a frightened look ......

"She's been on a hunger strike since she came to me, and I'm afraid she won't live much longer if she continues like this, so ...... apart from trying to earn some more... by giving it to you, I'm also doing a good deed.
"No matter what happens, I'm your saviour too, loosen your hand and take her back, you won't regret it and I believe in you as a person.
"Hey, he's your master now, go back with him."



The young girl mumbled ...... the word master ......
In the end, I took the young girl back to the residence...
"If you are willing to trust me, I will be your ...... master from now on, and you won't have to hurt yourself so much by going on hunger strike. "
"Master ...... man ......"

In the days that followed, I continued to live my life as a postman ...... except that there was another cat demon girl with me.
And this cat demon girl, her name is Suzu, is a ...... girl I will never forget.

◆How to play


The game is mainly a simulation of the type of gameplay by selecting certain 【Interaction】 to drive the time and certain values to trigger the event!
【Interaction】 can be performed several times a day.
【Interaction】 includes 【Talking】 【Working】 【Going out】 【H】 【Dressing up】 and so on.



There are also many H and non-H events that can be unlocked with certain actions.
In addition, 【H】 has many costume differences and poses.



【Work】 There is a special time mechanism.
【Interaction】 There is a function to give and use certain items.
【Dress up】 You can change your clothes and expression in some CG.

◆Game features


◇23 basic CGs, CG difference 250+.
◇The game text is 90,000+.
◇Drama oriented game
◇Game ending: 3 types
◇Medieval timeline style gameplay

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Redemption of the Cat Demon Girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You meet the cat demon girl "Suzu" when you go to a merchant's "friend" and he forcibly gives you Suzu, whose origin is unknown, but as certain things progress, you'll gradually find that some people and things are in need of redemption, and the "redemption" of ...... is, in the end, who?
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, German, Russian, Thai, Traditional Chinese
